title: Junior Sings, Vegans at BBQs, MTH, Lies Men Tell and more,
itunes:title: Junior Sings, Vegans at BBQs, MTH, Lies Men Tell and more,
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Junior's secret admirer from yesterday's Strawberry Letter got him singing Jodeci this morning. What do vegans say at BBQs? Is old school relationship advice outdated? Fool #2 murders another one. We have the lies that men tell when they get caught looking at another woman. The talk about the various BBQs across the country. Want to know the crews favorite sandwiches? Steve and Tommy talk about BBQ dietary restrictions. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve talks about worry and wasted time, plus more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
